channel.title: CVE Feed for Vsourz Digital -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Vsourz Digital -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37245|2024-07-22T09:08:51.359Z -- vsourz%20digital -- all%20in%20one%20redirection
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Vsourz Digital All In One Redirection allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects All In One Redirection: from n/a through 2.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-30506|2024-06-04T17:39:41.504Z -- vsourz%20digital -- all%20in%20one%20redirection
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Vsourz Digital All In One Redirection allows Stored XSS.This issue affects All In One Redirection: from n/a through 2.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-49852|2024-06-04T17:27:52.399Z -- vsourz%20digital -- responsive%20slick%20slider%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in Vsourz Digital Responsive Slick Slider WordPress allows Code Injection.This issue affects Responsive Slick Slider WordPress: from n/a through 1.4.
